Project.Name: CE216168_Base_Timer_PWM_Blinky
Project.Description: The firmware triggers scan conversions in the ADC to read the voltage across the potentiometer. It toggles an LED at the mid-point of the voltage range.application uses one of the Base Timers (BT) to blink an LED. The BT is configured to run in PWM mode with a 1/256 clock prescaler. The PWM generates interrupts that control the LED pin on both a duty value match (LED on) and underflow (LED off). The firmware sets the PWM period to one second and the duty cycle to 10%.
